confirm.title: Migrate {integration_title} Integration
confirm.description:
Go to the Settions/Devices section and add the {integration_title}.

{integration_title} should show up as a discovered device and the Client Id/Secret have been imported into the been Application Credentials section, so setup will only ask you to re-authenticate. Options for refresh rate and language are available in the device configure section, language defaults to Home Assistants setting.

Once imported you can remove the settings from configuration.yaml.
